updates.title: New Urban Park Environment
updates.description: Introducing a massive new urban skate park with multiple levels, hidden areas, and challenging obstacles. Features realistic city architecture and dynamic lighting effects.

updates.title: Enhanced Physics Engine
updates.description: Completely overhauled physics system for more realistic trick execution and landing mechanics. Improved collision detection and momentum preservation.

updates.title: Advanced Trick System
updates.description: Added 15 new trick combinations and improved the trick chaining system. Players can now create longer, more complex trick sequences.
